mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( ID, TITLE, CONTENT, AUTHOR, VIEWS, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{author}, #{views}, #{createdDate}, #{updatedDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET ID = #{id}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, AUTHOR = #{author}, VIEWS = #{views}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, TITLE, CONTENT, AUTHOR, VIEWS, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT ID, TITLE, CONTENT, AUTHOR, VIEWS, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE FROM BOARD ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC, ID DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT ID, TITLE, CONTENT, AUTHOR, VIEWS, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE FROM BOARD ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC, ID DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
